divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing at my friends house when i see low red light real bright.the light seem to turn white and desended away.Then it happen from the side of my friends house it wasn' close it was kind of far.then it went white in started to go little.it started flashing and then disappeared.then a whie light was flying over my head that also dissaperaed.the red light appeared on the other side of the house trice. i seen planes and helicopters fly by. it was one the sites i seen there has been a lot and they should be investigated . ihave 8 eyewitnesses that were with me. i wish you would call me.i have know picture but i will keep looking and reporting.
